# processIdentifier

**Instance Property**

The process ID (PID) of the connecting process.

## Declaration

```swift
var processIdentifier: pid_t { get }
```

## Discussion

This attribute may be used by the listener delegate to accept or reject connections.

## Working with security attributes

- **auditSessionIdentifier**: The BSM audit session identifier for the connecting process.
- **effectiveGroupIdentifier**: The effective group ID (EGID) of the connecting process.
- **effectiveUserIdentifier**: The effective user ID (EUID) of the connecting process.
